title: Circuits that draw most and least power

content.question: All four circuits shown above contain identical ideal batteries and identical resistors. Which circuits draw the most and least power from the battery?

choices.label: Most Power Least Power I II
Most Power Least Power I V
Most Power Least Power II III
Most Power Least Power IV I
Most Power Least Power IV III

content.answer: Most Power Least Power IV III

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
